List of Top Richest People in the World: Know Who is the Richest Person in the World 2022

%%00010
Get the List of Top Richest People in the World And Tesla's Elon Musk is the richest person in the world with a net worth of $239.3 billion as of 9 February 2022. And Adani become 3rd Richest Person in the World. Stay here to check most recent Worlds Billionaires lists and Richest People in the World below here.
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010Shailaja Tripathi%%00010Updated:%%00010Sep 28, 2022 12:49 IST%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010
%%00010List of wealthiest people%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010
%%00010

List of 20 richest people in the world 2022: As per the latest Bloomberg Billionaires Index, Gautam Adani has become the third richest person in the world and the first Asian to grab the position in the top 3 of the list. Adani is now behind Elon Musk and Jess Bezos with a net worth of $137 billion. He has also surpassed the Fresh Business magnate Bernard Arnault, the co-founder of LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton, a world leader in luxury fashion.

%%00010

As per the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires Index as well Gautam Adani is now at the fourth position with a net worth of $146 billion while Elon Musk is at the top followed by Bernard Arnault & Family and Jeff Bezos. 

%%00010

As per the estimation of Forbes, there are over 2700 billionaires across the world in 2021, 660 higher than the previous year with a record 493 new billionaires. Although the number of billionaires fell sharply in 2020 due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, it rebounded and surged in 2021. 

%%00010

List of 20 Richest Person in the world 2022

%%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010 %%00010

%%00010

Note: The above-mentioned ranking is based on real-time and may change due to the change in the prices of the shares of the listed people.

%%00010

As of 2021, the USA is the home to the highest numbers of billionaires in the world with 724, followed by China with 698 billionaires and India having 237 billionaires, according to Forbes.

%%00010

Top 10 Countries with Most Billionaires

%%00010

1. United States: 724 billionaires

%%00010

2. China: 698 billionaires

%%00010

3. India: 237 billionaires

%%00010

4. Germany: 136 billionaires

%%00010

5. Russia: 117 billionaires

%%00010

6. Hong Kong: 71 billionaires

%%00010

7. Brazil: 65 billionaires

%%00010

8. Canada: 64 billionaires

%%00010

9. United Kingdom: 56 billionaires

%%00010

10. Italy: 51 billionaires

%%00010

It is to be noted that the U.S. and China are home to over half of the world’s billionaires.

%%00010

Elon R Musk

%%00010

Elon Reeve Musk is an engineer, technology entrepreneur, industrial designer, and philanthropist. Elon Musk holds the citizenship of three countries-- South Africa (1971–present), Canada (1989–present), and the United States (2002-present).

%%00010
%%00010

He is the founder, CEO, and Chief Designer at SpaceX; co-founder, CEO, and product architect of Tesla, Inc.; founder of The Boring Company; co-founder of Neuralink; and co-founder and initial co-chairman of OpenAI. 

%%00010

Jeff Bezos

%%00010

He founded the e-commerce giant company Amazon in 1994 out of his garage in Seattle. He is the CEO of this company and owns an 11.1% stake.

%%00010

He would have been richer if he had not divorced his wife MacKenzie in 2019 after 25 years of marriage. He had to transfer a quarter of his Amazon stake to his wife. Currently, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest (at the age of just 36) billionaire in the top 20 list. 

%%00010

Gautam Adani

%%00010

Gautam Adani is the second richest man in Asia and India. His net worth is $89.9 billion. The rise of Adani came with the spike in the shares of his listed group firms and with the fall of RIL shares. He even surpassed the richest woman in the world, Francoise Bettencourt Meyers, and her family. 

%%00010

Mukesh Ambani

%%00010

the richest person in Asia runs oil and gas giant Reliance Industries Limited (RIL), India's one of the most valuable companies. Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) ranked number 1 in Fortune India 500 and #106 in Fortune Global 500 list in 2019.

%%00010

The 64-year-old Mukesh Ambani has petrochemicals, oil & gas, and telecom sectors are his main source of revenue. Currently, he is the 10th richest man in the world. 

%%00010

So, this was the list of the top 20 richest persons in the world. This list is very important for various competitive examinations and interviews.

%%00010

FAQ

%%00010
%%00010

Is Adani 3rd Richest Person in the World? %%00010%%00010

%%00010
Gautam Adani has become the 3rd richest person in the world, as per the latest Bloomberg Billionaires Index.
%%00010

Who is the richest person in the world?%%00010

%%00010
Elon Musk is the richest person in the world with a net worth of $250 billion.
%%00010

Who is 3rd richest man in the world?%%00010

%%00010
As per the Bloomberg Billionaire Index, Gautam Adani is currently the third richest person in the world.
%%00010

What is the net worth of Gautam Adani?%%00010

%%00010
Gautam Adani has a total net worth of $137 billion.
%%00010
